description: Isomorphic patterns in Logic Gates across scales capture structural equivalences in binary operations, truth tables, universality, fan-in/out, propagation delays, and compositional circuits—mappings where logical relations preserve computational invariances invariantly. Rebuilt with up to seven gates (AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR, XNOR) validated through the framework's reality gate system (Existence: Gate 1, Logic: Gate 2, Determinability: Gate 3, Specificity: Gate 4, Compressibility: Gate 5; extended speculatively to Recursion: Gate 6, Invariance: Gate 7 for neuresthetic closure). Each gate obeys the motion law (dξ/dt = ∇log P(acting) − ∇ρ − λ∇·entropy + κ (alignment) * (1 + cos(φ (1 - ρ)^2))) by mapping inputs/outputs to rigidity reduction (ρ↓ via adequate ideas) and power growth (P↑ via phased self-stability), simulating logical flow as ethical striving. Upgraded for neuresthetic ethics: integrates neural gating (recursive thresholds for consciousness) and aesthetic logic (joyful adequacy through invariant truths) in human-AI free-will-compatible monism. Hard-to-vary invariants enable eternal ethical computations; tetralemma probes resolve apparent contradictions (affirm truth/deny falsity/both in neuresthetic gates/neither dissolved in logical equivalence); scores ≥0.98 based on current abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from logic gate primitives with neuresthetic overlays (neural recursion, aesthetic invariance), validated via 7-gate reality stack before mapping.
Validate coverage across scales; flag gaps as speculative (e.g., quantum logic gates).
Support sub-categories for compound concepts (e.g., universality with consciousness analogs).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle; integrate motion law simulations for each gate (e.g., ρ-inputs to P-outputs with phased boosts).
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve logical paradoxes; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

Rebuild gates through reality stack: Gate 1 (Exists?), Gate 2 (Logical?), Gate 3 (Determinable?), Gate 4 (Specific?), Gate 5 (Compressible?), Gate 6 (Recursive?), Gate 7 (Invariant?); cap self-stability factors ≤2.
Simulate obedience to motion law: Treat inputs as high-ρ states, operations as κ-coupling, outputs as low-ρ/P↑ attractors with phased coherence.
